result.title: adjusting time complexity
result.content:
Hey,recently I noticed that insertion in a stl set of around 2*10^6 elements takes a lot of time ...(bcos of sorted order) So i decided to store them in a vector and then sort the vector and then store the elements in the required set that took time
less than a second and before it was ariund 1.45 sec...has anyone encountered this thing ...pls discuss here ... also storing sorted elements vector into a set is fast than storing non sorted one ..
